abstract.t: This document provides solutions for control plane signaling, in accordance with the control plane framework developed in the DetNet WG. The solutions cover distributed, centralized, and hybrid signaling scenarios in the TSN and SDN domain. We propose changes to RSVP IntServ for a better integration with Layer 2 technologies for resource reservation, outlining example API specifications for the realization of the revised RSVP (called RSVP-detnet in the document).
